TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit ConfigurationElementProperty extends System.Object

Docs.summary: Specifies the property of a configuration element. This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks This class can be used to validate configuration element properties. Also, this class can be used in conjunction with the <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement> class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(class System.Configuration.ConfigurationValidatorBase validator) cil managed

Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Configuration.ConfigurationElementProperty"> class, based on a supplied parameter.
Gets a <see cref="T:System.Configuration.ConfigurationValidatorBase"> object used to validate the <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationElementProperty> object.
